RelatedActivityType.name: Child
RelatedActivityType.description: A sub-activity (sub-component) of a larger activity (the parent)

RelatedActivityType.name: Sibling
RelatedActivityType.description: A sub-activity (sub-component) related to another sub-activity of the same parent

RelatedActivityType.name: Co-funded
RelatedActivityType.description: An activity that receives funding from more than one organisation

RelatedActivityType.name: Third Party
RelatedActivityType.description: A report by another organisation on the same activity (excluding activities reported as part of financial transactions - eg. provider-activity-id - or a co-funded activity using code = 4)
